TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlPersister extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在设计时用于保持 Web 服务器控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的方法可以保持控件或为字符串的 aspx 代码接口实现。The class provides methods that can persist a control or an interface implementation as a string of aspx code. 这些方法的实现由驱动的元数据属性，如， ，和。The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the , , and . > [!NOTE] > Web 窗体页设计器不支持 Reset PropertyName （可选） 公开的属性持久性基于 Microsoft Windows 窗体的控件的方法。The Web Forms page designer does not support the ResetPropertyName method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence. 若要创建对象或接口通过分析一串控件或模板持久性数据，请使用类方法。To create a object or an interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the class methods. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个数据字符串，它表示指定控件的持久形式。

span.span: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法要求实现正常工作。This method requires an implementation to work correctly. 此方法使用要检索的设计器宿主的指定控件。This method uses the of the specified control to retrieve the designer host. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#3)]
